# FormatterUtilities.MakeSpaces method

Generate strings of spaces of any width.

```csharp
public static string MakeSpaces(int width)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| width | A non-negative number |

## Return Value

A string of size *width* of only spaces
